title.narrative: 3.3 TEACHERS COMPETENCIES

description.narrative: 3.3 Government partners have improved capacity to develop and implement programmes that enhance teachers' and managers' competencies and skills to provide efficient, effective, gender-responsive and inclusive quality instruction, in early childhood education and general secondary education., which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, more children, especially the most vulnerable benefit from inclusive and equitable early childhood education (ECE), quality basic education and improved learning outcomes.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 3.3 Government partners have improved capacity to develop and implement programmes that enhance teachers? and managers?competencies and skills to provide efficient, effective, gender-responsive and inclusive quality instruction, in early childhoodeducation and general secondary education.

description.narrative: 112,000 teachers,;almost 90 percent of;all;primary school teachers;in the country;undertaking training on new curricula implementation. It was possible due to;UNICEF;supported interventions;initiating;the;implementation of;the teacher professional;standards and;teacher appraisal mechanisms at both preschool and;general-secondary;education;(GSE);levels,;reviewing,;and revising the pre-service;and in-service curriculum for preschool teacher;education,;reviewing;the;in-service teachers&39; training;program;for GSE;;and providing;online learning for teachers;in line with new curriculum and inclusive education requirements.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:14/01/2022
